natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer
Class SurfaceRealizer

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer.SurfaceRealizer
All Implemented Interfaces:
RDGTransformer
public class SurfaceRealizer
extends java.lang.Object
implements RDGTransformer

The SurfaceRealizer takes an URL or a File, reads the rhetorical dependency graph and transforms it to a Surface Form, contained in a String. It has several Discourse Histories to keep track of some aspects of recent utterances, such as characters and cue words.
